home.title: Decentralized Meeting
home.longDescription: Decentralized Plenum is a censorship-resistant space for voice-based public discussions, collective decisions, and anonymous participation — designed to empower communities with real-time, secure peer-to-peer tools.
home.loginRequired: You must be logged in to access rooms.

description.part1: Decentralized Plenum is a secure online space for
description.strong: open discussions, anonymous participation, and collective decision-making
description.part2: . You can join voice-based rooms, speak freely, share documents, and vote on important topics — without needing an account or revealing your identity.

features.title: What You Can Do
items: Join or create voice rooms instantly
Vote on questions with Yes/No polls
See vote results live and stay in control

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.text: You can create an account using only an anonymous username and secure it locally with a password. When you create a room, you automatically become the host. The host shares the room link with others, who can join as guests without registering, optionaly making username. Votes, audio, and shared content are transmitted directly between participants — with no central control, no login requirement for guests, and no tracking. Everything — including discussions, voting, and file sharing — stays on participant devices and is never stored on external servers.

getInvolved.title: Why Use It?
getInvolved.text: Decentralized Plenum is built to protect free speech and help communities organize safely. It works without central control and gives power back to the people using it.
